mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pill(pill_no, manager_no, dno, pill_name, efficacy, side, passwd, search file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, rdate) VALUES(pill_seq.nextval, #{manager_no}, #{dno}, #{pill_name}, #{efficacy}, #{side}, #{file1}, #{file1saved}, #{thumb1}, #{size1}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT pill_no, manager_no, dno, pill_name, efficacy, side, views, passwd, search, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1 FROM pill ORDER BY pill_no DESC
SELECT pill_no, manager_no, dno, pill_name, efficacy, side, views, passwd, search, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1 FROM pill WHERE dno = #{dno} ORDER BY pill_no DESC
SELECT pill_no, manager_no, dno, pill_name, efficacy, side, views, passwd, search, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1 FROM pill WHERE pill_no = #{pill_no}

SELECT pill_no, manager_no, dno, pill_name, efficacy, side, views, passwd, search, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1 FROM pill
WHERE dno=#{dno}
WHERE dno=#{dno} AND (UPPER(pill_name) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{search}) || '%' OR UPPER(efficacy) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{search}) || '%' OR UPPER(side) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{search}) || '%')
ORDER BY pill_no DESC
